scripts.package:chrome: npm run build:chrome && cd dist/chrome && bestzip ../../extension-chrome.zip *
scripts.package:firefox: npm run build:firefox && web-ext lint -s dist/firefox && web-ext build -s dist/firefox -a . -n extension-firefox.zip -o
scripts.integration-tests: cross-env NOTIFYME_TESTING=1 npm run build:chrome && cross-env PW_EXPERIMENTAL_SERVICE_WORKER_NETWORK_EVENTS=1 npx playwright test
